title: Embrace a Waterside Morning in Toyosu
description: Experience a refreshing morning in Toyosu, overlooking Tokyo Bay. From renowned specialty coffee shops to open-air park cafes, we introduce Toyosu's unique waterside morning spots.
content:
# Embrace a Waterside Morning in Toyosu

Facing Tokyo Bay, Toyosu is a vibrant new area charming with its waterside scenery and modern cityscape. In this district, home to the Toyosu Market and large commercial complexes, we introduce cafes where you can enjoy a refreshing start to your day. Experience a morning unique to Toyosu in an open and inviting atmosphere.

## Waterside Park Cafe

<Place id="ChIJdQ36cQCJGGAReGpw_gW7fic" />
Blue Bottle Coffee, located within Toyosu Park. From its glass-walled, open interior, you can enjoy views of the park's greenery and the waterside. Their carefully hand-dripped coffee boasts a deep flavor that brings out the maximum individuality of the beans. During morning hours, the breakfast menu is also extensive, featuring pastries and toast. Indulge in a blissful coffee experience amidst the refreshing waterside air.

## Italian Cafe

<Place id="ChIJB_4e6r-JGGARQnPhmEyBN_E" />
A cafe in Toyosu where you can enjoy authentic Italian coffee. Its highlight is the aromatic coffee made using Segafredo's espresso. The breakfast menu is also extensive, allowing you to enjoy coffee alongside Italian-style light meals. It's a sophisticated, hidden gem of a cafe in Toyosu, perfect for a relaxed morning.

## Farm-to-Table Cafe

<Place id="ChIJvbA8JdWJGGARbLIta-OKX5I" />
A cafe in Toyosu where you can savor fresh, farm-direct vegetables. The morning menu features an abundant lineup of salads and smoothies made with freshly harvested produce, allowing you to enjoy a healthy and delicious breakfast. Its bright and open interior is the perfect setting to revitalize your morning. Experience a wholesome breakfast in Toyosu that's kind to your body.

## A Refreshing Morning in Toyosu

From waterside park cafes to Italian and farm-to-table cafes, Toyosu offers a diverse array of morning spots where you can enjoy the waterside scenery. Why not embrace a morning unique to Toyosu, feeling the refreshing breeze from Tokyo Bay?
